reference: All data are in nominal USD. Adjust (to taste) accordingly.
title: Select World Bank Commodity Price Data (Monthly)
description:
Description
A data set on select, monthly commodity prices made available by the
World Bank in its so-called "pink sheet." These data are potentially
useful for applications on data gathering, inflation adjustments,
indexing, cointegration, general economic riff-raff, and more.

parameters.tea_columbo: tea (Colombo auctions), Sri Lankan origin, all tea, arithmetic average of weekly quotes ($/kg).
parameters.coffee_arabica: coffee (ICO), International Coffee Organization indicator price, other mild Arabicas, average New York and Bremen/Hamburg markets, ex-dock ($/kg)
parameters.coffee_robustas: coffee (ICO), International Coffee Organization indicator price, Robustas, average New York and Le Havre/Marseilles markets, ex-dock ($/kg)
parameters.tea_kolkata: tea (Kolkata auctions), leaf, include excise duty, arithmetic average of weekly quotes ($/kg).
parameters.sugar_us: sugar (United States), nearby futures contract, c.i.f. ($/kg)
parameters.tea_mombasa: tea (Mombasa/Nairobi auctions), African origin, all tea, arithmetic average of weekly quotes ($/kg).
parameters.oil_dubai: crude oil, Dubai Fateh 32 API for years 1985-present; 1960-84 refer to Saudi Arabian Light, 34 API ($/bbl).
parameters.sugar_world: sugar (World), International Sugar Agreement (ISA) daily price, raw,  f.o.b. and stowed at greater Caribbean ports ($/kg).
parameters.sugar_eu: sugar (EU), European Union negotiated import price for raw unpackaged sugar from African, Caribbean and Pacific (ACP) under Lome Conventions, c.I.f. European ports ($/kg)

format: A data frame with the following 11 variables.
